title: Thermal Engineer
summary: The Apple Thermal team is seeking a world-class Thermal Engineer to play a key role in the definition and design of Apple products.
description:
You will be tasked with impacting product design decisions by providing reliable analysis and thermal insight. In addition, you will lead the design and implementation of thermal solutions and participate in design reviews and technology investigations. You will also be responsible for:
-  Specification and optimization of thermal control parameters
-  Defining and guiding thermal and flow experiments to characterize materials, components, and systems
-  Analysis of system test data and preparing summary reports
-  Communication of status and results to cross-functional teams and management
-  Occasional travel required
key_qualifications:
Deep technical and functional expertise in conduction, convection (natural and forced), and radiation, as well as numeric modeling techniques and concepts is a requirement. A thorough understanding of and experience with heat sinks, heat pipes, vapor chambers, fans and blowers is also critical. Beyond that, knowledge related to the following is desirable:
- CFD and CAD tools
- Optimization techniques and reduced order modeling approaches
- Scripting (e.g. perl, python) and data graphics (e.g. MATLAB, SciPy)
- Flow and thermal measurement of systems and material properties
- Manufacturing processes related to thermal interfaces and seals
education_experience: M.S. or Ph.D. (preferred) in Mechanical Engineering with emphasis on Heat Transfer or Fluid Dynamics
